name: Mage Runner (fullmetal_automaton)
description:
Mage Runner

---

You're a mage chasing the ultimate power at the bottom of an infinitely deep dungeon. How low can you make it before getting overwhelmed by the opposition?

Use WASD to move, and Mouse to shoot.

---

Known Bugs:

---

- Difficulty scaling is pretty rough unless RNGsus is on your side.

- Sometimes on start, the ladder screen is shown instead of the player's spawn screen. Restarting the game should fix this.

---

Credits

---

Programmer: Nick Valentine

Artist: Dealgaro
